body_html: @simpeng Also, could you show a little on how to downgrade gprc? I mannually use pip uninstall grpcio and pip install grpcio==1.0.0, but it seems still reporting same error. I wonder if this needs to revert grpc somewhere else in tensorflow?

body: @simpeng Also, could you show a little on how to downgrade gprc? I mannually use pip uninstall grpcio and pip install grpcio==1.0.0, but it seems still reporting same error. I wonder if this needs to revert grpc somewhere else in tensorflow?
